p: In acute oral toxicity test, the leaves extract of A. polystachyus revealed no mortality 2 gm/kg bodyweight concentration in mice. The mice did not also demonstrate any toxic effects like changes in behavioral activities such as anxiety, polyuria, diarrhea, seizures, and coma. Thus, the median lethal dose (LD 50) of the extract of A. polystachyus is >2gm/kg.
